Summary statistics for a Polars DataFrame

Source: R/summary.R
summary.RPolarsDataFrame.Rd

Summary statistics for a Polars DataFrame

Usage

# S3 method for class 'RPolarsDataFrame'
summary(object, percentiles = c(0.25, 0.75), ...)

Arguments

object

A Polars DataFrame.

percentiles

One or more percentiles to include in the summary statistics. All values must be between 0 and 1 (NULL are ignored).

...

Ignored.

Examples

mtcars |>
  as_polars_df() |>
  summary(percentiles = c(0.2, 0.4, 0.6, 0.8))
#> shape: (11, 12)
#> ┌────────────┬───────────┬──────────┬────────────┬───┬──────────┬──────────┬──────────┬────────┐

#> │ str        ┆ f64       ┆ f64      ┆ f64        ┆   ┆ f64      ┆ f64      ┆ f64      ┆ f64    │
